title: Marin's portfolio
subTitle: Welcome to my personal website
description: Hi! My name is Marin Marinov. I'm 24 years old from Hisarya. My interest about computer science start at High School (2011). I studied "System Engineering in PG Gen. Vladimir Zaimov - Sopot ". After that I moved to Sofia and continued my education in Technical University of Sofia. Where I graduated bachelor degree of Computer and Software engineering. In 2018 I started my professional career and my first job was a Trainee Web Developer. For past 3 years I improved my skills a lot and now is time for change =). About my hobbies I like mountain hiking, traveling, reading historical books, playing board games with friends and really enjoy driving.
